alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Orange; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 09 at 6:38PM EDT until July 09 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... Southern Durham County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Orange County in central North Carolina... Central Wake County in central North Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, Wake Forest, Carrboro, Zebulon, RDU International, Morrisville, Knightdale, Wendell, Rolesville, William B Umstead State Park, Falls Lake Boat Ramp, Rollingview Marina, Research Triangle, Falls Lake, Falls Lake State Rec Area, Bethesda and Gorman. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
